storability: Retains 55%-65% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20ºC (68ºF)
style_guide: Dunkel, Strong Ale, Pilsner, Altbier, Weizenbock, Golden Ale, Marzen, Pale Ale, Wheat, Specialty Ale, Hefeweizen, Light Ale, Lager
substitutes: Hallertauer Tradition, Spalt Select, Mt Hood, Strisselspalter, Hallertau, Liberty
also_known_as: Hersbrucker-G, Hersbrucker Late, Hersbrucker Spaet, Hersbrucker Spat
name: Hersbrucker
